title: Executive Order 5334-Appointment of Mrs. Selma F. Dinger
content: Mrs. Selma F. Dinger may be appointed to a suitable position in the War Department without regard to the civil service rules.
Mrs. Dinger is the widow of Capt. Harry A. Dinger, an outstanding pilot in the Air Corps, who was killed in an airplane accident on December 20, 1929, at Bolling Field, Washington, D.C.
Captain Dinger served continuously during the World War, and as a pilot was selected for many important missions.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Secretary of War.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5334-Appointment of Mrs. Selma F. Dinger Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372939
